title: Fortnite Chapter 2 Battle Pass skins revealed as new season kicks off
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Fortnite has kickstarted a new era after blowing open its world with an apocalyptic event, with a new Battle Pass offering an array of new skins.

Fortnite Chapter 2 or season 11 has brought a new map, pilotable boats, fishing, new hideouts, and a brand new XP system into the mix – after season 10 concluded with a full blackout.

A new season comes fresh with a new Chapter 2 Battle Pass, which also means a new batch of skins to unlock through missions and levelling up.

Advertisement

Advertisement

So here’s all the skins available in the Fortnite Chapter 2 Battle Pass.

Journey Vs Hazard (Level 1, complete 3 missions to unlock)

(Picture: Epic Games)

(Picture: Epic Games)

Turk Vs Riptide (Level 1, complete 2 missions to unlock)

Turk skin in Fortnite (Picture: Epic Games)

Riptide skin (Picture: Epic Games)

Rippley Vs Sludge (Level 20, reach level 20 to unlock variant)

(Picture: Epic Games)

(Picture: Epic Games)

Remedy Vs Toxin (Level 40, reach level 40 to unlock two variants)

(Picture: Epic Games)

(Picture: Epic Games)

8-Ball Vs Scratch (Level 60, reach level 60 to unlock variant)

(Picture: Epic Games)

(Picture: Epic Games)

Cameo Vs Chic (Level 80, reach level 80 to unlock variant)

(Picture: Epic Games)

(Picture: Epic Games)

Fusion (Level 100, complete Vex and Xev objectives to unlock two variants)

(Picture: Epic Games)

As a reminder, these skins are purely cosmetic and won’t affect your gameplay.

The Battle Pass costs 950 V-Bucks, although you can purchase it with the first 25 tiers unlocked for 2,800 V-Bucks.

Email gamecentral@ukmetro.co.uk, leave a comment below, and follow us on Twitter.
description: Here are all the Fortnite Chapter 2 Battle Pass skins you can unlock.
